courseDescription:
Perl is a popular language amongst developers around the globe. A cross-platform language, its simplicity and versatility have generated the interest of all those who are either working or want to work with text manipulation, system administration, web development, network programming, GUI development or other related areas. Completing this course will be a great starting point for gaining fluency in the coding universe of Perl. You will become versed in the fundamentals and concepts of Perl and build your own Perl application or project.

This self-paced course helps you master the fundamentals, features and concepts to play around with Perl and build and design Perl applications. Each section and lecture comes bundled with sample projects that help you practice and reinforce the expertise you gain. In addition, there is a specially created project with all the source codes to help you utilize what you learn and further review your competence. The codes are also available for download from the resource section to help you practice and perfect your Perl fundamentals.

This course is an excellent start for those who are new to Perl or have an interest in development but still consider themselves a beginner. As it covers all the latest features of the Perl language, it also matches the needs of those familiar with Perl but who want to review their knowledge. The specifically designed crash course helps you apply your skills to different jobs and projects at the start. The learning will help you add expertise to your portfolio and raise your professional stakes. Join now and be a sought-after Perl developer.

modules.description: This module further raises your skills with Perl by teaching you major Perl elements like subroutines, input and out operators, and hashes.
